content:
Yes, here are some common customer complaints that hotels receive during a guest's stay:

1. Room cleanliness issues (e.g. dirty linens, uncleaned bathroom, dust on furniture)
2. Noise disturbance (e.g. loud music or parties, construction work, noisy neighbors)
3. Inadequate facilities (e.g. malfunctioning air conditioning, broken shower, lack of basic amenities)
4. Poor customer service (e.g. unresponsive staff, rude behavior, lack of communication)
5. Billing errors (e.g. incorrect charges or overcharges)
6. Unfulfilled requests (e.g. missing or delayed room service, unavailability of requested amenities)
7. Security concerns (e.g. unsafe location, non-functioning locks, unauthorized access to rooms)
8. Inadequate internet or Wi-Fi connectivity.
